revised_title: Postscript to a Paper on the Deflection of the Plumb-Line in India, Caused by the Attraction of the Himalayan Mountains
tldr: The author, Archdeacon Pratt, provides a postscript to his previous paper on the deflection of the plumb-line in India due to the attraction of the Himalayan Mountains. He incorporates new information from Major Strachey's work on the physical geography of the region and adjusts the assumptions about the height of the table-land. The resulting northern deflections and errors in astronomical amplitudes are discussed, highlighting the need for accurate deflection data to improve geodetic calculations and mapping precision.
